Carillon NYC

New York City's first and best carillon enthusiast music interest group!
We teach and play bells in churches across the city, hold social meetup events, and much more.

What's a Carillon?

A unique instrument and experience!

A carillon is a piano-like musical instrument housed in the bell tower of a church. The bells can be played serially to generate melodies, or together to produce chords. The unique nature of the carillon allows entire busy streets of NYC to be your audience as they'll hear carilloneurs playing tunes atop church bell towers!

I Want to Try!

Our Events

Lessons

Play Music

Join a fun group of musicians and play at one of our member churches!

Exclusive Church Tours

Tour the private, normally inaccessible bell towers and rooftops of churches across NYC.

Network and Community

Attend social meetup events where you can network and join a community of fellow musicians!
